name: Une Voix Venue D'ailleurs
desc: At the beginning of an enemy target's turn, additionally trigger extra DoT DMG calculations 1 time, and each DoT status currently on the target will immediately deal DMG equal to 90% of the original DMG.
enhanced_desc: At the beginning of an enemy target's turn, additionally trigger extra DoT DMG calculations 1 time, and each DoT status currently on the target will immediately deal DMG equal to 135% of the original DMG.
